TopicTitle: old and anoying bug with SOI

Articles.Content:
An old bug in KSP is then you enconter an later SOI with an secondary moon causes the first SOI to go away.

in this setting I used an mechjeb for the hohmann transfeer to Minmus then a closed approach to target=50 km burn.

The active node is an repeat of the 50km closest approach so the only thing missing is the SOI change, its also not only an visual change, neither alarm clock or mechjeb find the SOI change.

Mods used is Mechjeb, KAS, ActiveTextureManagement, Karbonite and KerbalAlarmClock

However this is an bug dating back to 0.20 or before.

is this an confirmed bug and does it exist any workaround, i imagine it would be far worse for an new player without mechjeb.
